section.p: The Anesthesia section briefly records the type of anesthesia (e.g., general or local) and may state the actual agent used. This may or may not be a subsection of the Procedure Description section. The full details of anesthesia are usually found in a separate Anesthesia Note.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="59774-0" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:8067)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8092)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8094)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="59774-0" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:8067)
